examples:
A monkey and polar bear host a casual podcast about AI inference, bringing their unique perspectives from different environments (tropical vs. arctic) to discuss how AI systems make decisions and process information.
Sample Dialogue:
Monkey (Banana): "Welcome back to Bananas & Ice! I am Banana"
Polar Bear (Ice): "And I'm Ice!"
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The text prompt describing the video you want to generate

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video. Only 16:9 and 9:16 are supported.

generate_audio.title: Generate Audio
generate_audio.description: Whether to generate audio for the video. If false, 50% less credits will be used.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the generated video in seconds

image_url.title: Image URL
image_url.description: URL of the input image to animate. Should be 720p or higher resolution in 16:9 or 9:16 aspect ratio. If the image is not in 16:9 or 9:16 aspect ratio, it will be cropped to fit.
